ygData.subject: Re: NBW
ygData.msgSnippet: The CR chamber opened to let Lunarpine out, his internal repairs could handle the rest. the only thing that it couldn t repair was his pride. He walked down

The CR chamber opened to let Lunarpine out, his internal repairs 
could handle the rest. the only thing that it couldn't repair was his 
pride.

He walked down the hall after Shadow Wing. "Wing wait" he called 
after her, "what is it you want from me?" He already knew the answer, 
he'd only hoped he was wrong.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She took one look at him. She smiled warmly at him.  She put her 
had 
> on his shoulder. She looked into his eyes.
> "PRED POOP!"
> She turned on her heels and walked down the hall.
> "When you want to tell me what really happened, let me know."
> She walked away and towards the entrance to the ship.
> 
> She knew he had to have run into trouble out there.  She also knew 
> that if he told her what realy happened, his pride would be bruised.
> But she wanted him to tell her the truth.  If she had to speak 
> truthfully to him, he would have to be so to her.  She 
smiled, "yup, 
> I have to so he has to as well."
> 
> She wasn't mad at him, but it did hurt that he felt that he 
couldn't 
> tell her what happened out right.  Maybe he was trying to protect 
his 
> pride? Maybe he lost the fight and didn't want to tell her? Who 
> knows. But it did hurt that he couldn't just tell her outright. 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "I'll be alright Wing, anone hurt by the blast?" he'd do or say 
> > almost anything to change the conversation. It wasn't working.
> > 
> > "I don't see any other glowing sights around here." he tried to 
> > change her mood, that didn't work either
> > 
> > "OK Wing you want the truth, here it is. It wasn't an entire 
> platoon 
> > of Preds, it was only four or five. I would'v stayed to finish 
them 
> > but I figured they won't mess with me again. That is once they're 
> out 
> > of Stasis lock." He still didn't want to admit his stupidity to 
her.
> > 
> > "I would've called but I didn't want to ruin your fun." with any 
> luck 
> > she'd stop the interogation. Again he knew his luck.
> > 
> >  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > ::Shadow Wing::
> > > 
> > > She smlied when she knew he was alright. "How are you feeling? 
> Yes 
> > > there was an explosion, but all is calm now." She took a quick 
> over 
> > > look of him to make sure he was all healed.  "Glowing sight 
huh? 
> > me? 
> > > yeah I'll be glowing alright, as soon as you tell me what 
really 
> > > happened out there.  You looked like you faught an entire 
platoon 
> > of 
> > > preds.  What happened?"
> > > She turned and took a few steps away, turned and looked at him.
> > > "Blast, I was worried sick. No messages, no communication at 
all, 
> I 
> > > was about to fly the globe looking for you. THank the Matrix 
your 
> > > alright. But what happened?"
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > >   Lunarpine awoke, the sedative wearing off, his first sight 
> was 
> > > > Shadow Wing looking in on him. "What happened Wing," he 
> > asked "What 
> > > > was that explosion?" He stared at her a moment, she seemed to 
> > have 
> > > an 
> > > > almost angelic glow around her.
> > > > 
> > > > "I must be functional there wouldn't be such a glowing sight 
in 
> > the 
> > > > Pit." Shadow Wing no longer looked angry at him, just 
concerned.
> > > >
